data.eml:eml: Taxonomic status of the barbastelles (Chiroptera: Vespertilionidae: Barbastella) from the Japanese archipelago and Kunashir Island

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kruskop, Sergei V., Kawai, Kuniko, Tiunov, Mikhail P. (2019): Taxonomic status of the barbastelles (Chiroptera: Vespertilionidae: Barbastella) from the Japanese archipelago and Kunashir Island. Zootaxa 4567 (3): 461-476, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4567.3.3
